import React from 'react'; import LatexText from './LatexText'; import { loadQuestions, loadProgress, findQuestionById, getProgressSummary } from '../utils'; export default function HomeView({ onOpenCluster, onOpenSaved }) { const data = loadQuestions(); const progress = loadProgress(); const summary = getProgressSummary(data, progress); return (

{cluster.name}
{cluster.completed}/{cluster.total} completed
{cluster.percent}%
    {cluster.topics.map((t, ti) => (
  • onOpenCluster(cluster.name, t.name)} style={{ cursor: 'pointer', flex: 1 }}>
    {t.name}
    {t.completed}/{t.total} â€¢ {t.percent}%
    • ))}
))}
); }
